quotes.quote: My drug of choice is love. Sure, I've tried other drugs, but no other drug gets both the dealer and user high from every transaction.
I don't get high, but sometimes I wish I did. That way, when I messed up in life I would have an excuse. But right now there's no rehab for stupidity.
I don't need anything to get high. I'm high on life.
Be drunk in love and high on life.
People don't want other people to get high, because if you get high, you might see the falsity of the fabric of the society we live in.
Getting high off life is more than enough, and peer pressure ain't peer pressure when a boy is tough.
I got high, and forgot I wasn't supposed to get high.
I kept getting high to kill my shame at the fact that I kept getting high.
If love is a form of substance abuse, I hope to die high.
I be getting high just to balance out the lows.
Don't spend your life getting high on drugs, get high on life.

Marijuana enhances our mind in a way that enables us to take a different perspective from 'high up', to see and evaluate our own lives and the lives of others in a privileged way. Maybe this euphoric and elevating feeling of the ability to step outside the box and to look at life’s patterns from this high perspective is the inspiration behind the slang term 'high' itself.
My mind may be sober, but my confidence is high!
Flying starts from the ground. The more grounded you are, the higher you fly.
Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
Alcohol and marijuana, if used in moderation, plus loud, usually low-class music, make stress and boredom infinitely more bearable.
I know you’re supposed to tell kids not to do drugs, but, kids, do it! Do weed! Don’t do the other stuff, but weed is good!
Everything is better with a bag of weed.
Struggle is the enemy, but weed is the remedy.
Is marijuana addictive? Yes, in the sense that most of the really pleasant things in life are worth endlessly repeating.
Alcohol and marijuana, if used in moderation, plus loud, usually low-class music, make stress and boredom infinitely more bearable.
He doesn't want to get high. He wants to avoid the pain of withdrawal. If he doesn't make it through rehab, he'll just go back to heroin and keep using it until it kills him.
How many special people change? / How many lives are living strange? / Where were you while we were getting high?
If you see me getting mighty if you see me getting high / Knock me down / I'm not bigger than life
The two of us are getting high / We don't need drugs 'cause we know how to fly
Corrupting in the air / I really need you / You got two play rides / I really love them / My we're getting high / Are we getting high
I'm on a high, I'm on a high / there's nothing more to it / We are the sea and the sky / and the blue that runs through it
I'm on a high I'm on a high / and there's nothing more to it / I have the sun, it's a star / why should I refuse it
We were on the low, but you were getting high with me / When it's past 11, that's a different side I see
Getting high off the ground / We're fading away / Lost and not found
I was gonna clean my room until I got high / I was gonna get up and find the broom but then I got high / My room is still messed up and I know why (why, man?) / Yeah, hey / Cause I got high

I was gonna go to class before I got high (come on, y'all) / (Check it out) / I could have cheated and I could have passed but I got high / I am taking it next semester and I know why (why, man?) / Yeah, hey / Cause I got high
I wasn't gonna run from the cops / But I was high (I'm serious man) / I was gonna pull right over and stop / But I was high / Now I am a paraplegic and I know why (why man?) / Cause I got high
Oh, come on, pop. All my friends smoke pot and they're not criminals.
Listen, when I was growing pot, I realized that the more seeds I planted, the more pot I could ultimately smoke
Well, maybe if pot made them peaceful, we all should take pot.
I promised her if I ever smoked the pot I would do it with her.
You beautiful, stupid young man. That is not pot. It's hashish, Moroccan, and the finest.
Did we come all the way to Europe just to smoke pot? We did that everyday when we were in college. Why don't we go check out a museum or something?
We didn't have rehab back in the seventies. Back in the seventies rehab meant you'd stop doing coke, but kept smoking pot and drinking for a couple more weeks.
Pot balances me out. Pot brings me up. That's I smoke it if I'm going to be drinking.
The two drugs contrast in some respects. Alcohol depresses the nervous system; marijuana does not.
High doses, the drinker may experience difficulty walking or, famously, pronouncing words, and may black out or even, in extreme cases, die.
Scientific research now demonstrates that marijuana is a medical drug, too.

Cannabis has always figured in the pharmacopoeias of Europe and China, although these traditional medical uses, such as hemp seed oil in the ear for earache, or cannabis-leaf poultices on a sprain, did not involve getting high.
Marijuana or by its botanical name Cannabis sativa, has been cultivated worldwide for centuries.
The Cannabis plant, also raised for the production of hemp fiber, is more generally grown and consumed(smoked) for its medicinal and psychoactive effects.
Marijuana use was legal under state and federal law, but it was smoked more to achieve intoxication than to relieve medical symptoms.
Despite law enforcement's efforts to control its distribution and use, marijuana has over the years acquired a reputation as the most widely used illicit substance in the nation.
When a young person starts out with drugs, at first there is curiosity and excitement.
As tolerance to the drug increases, the dose needed for a satisfactory high becomes overwhelming so the expense goes up exponentially.
